title: Sociological Methodology - Surveying Spontaneous Mass Protests: Mixed-mode Sampling and Field Methods

description: Author Samson Yuen discusses his article, "Surveying Spontaneous Mass Protests: Mixed-mode Sampling and Field Methods," published in the February 2022 issue of Sociological Methodology.
